title: Tureen With Cover And Stand
dimensions:
Tureen: W x D: 38 x 28 cm (14 15/16 x 11 in.)
Cover: W x D: 36 x 26 cm (14 3/16 x 10 1/4 in.)
Stand:  W x D: 39.5 x 30 cm (15 9/16 x 11 13/16 in.)
creditline: Gift of Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw
description: Oval Tureen (a) with stepped domed lid (b) having shaped edge and center knop; oval stand (c) with shaped edge; all with white ground decorated with ochre flowers and foliage; narrow band along edges of cover and stand.

tombstone.epitaph:
Tureen With Cover And Stand.
Tin-glazed earthenware. Gift of Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw. 2008-40-7-a/c.
